title: error en una cuenta de correo
creator: eacevedop
content: hola, he usado por muchos años Thunderbird para administrar mis cuentas de correo pero ahora me esta mandando error en una de mi cuentas de correo "No se puede guardar el mensaje en el buzón de correo. Compruebe que tiene permiso de escritura en el directorio y suficiente espacio en disco para copiar el buzón de correo." ya cambie todos los correos de la bandeja de entrada, enviados y una carpeta "mensajes" a una carpeta en "carpetas locales" pero me sigue mandando este mensaje de error y no descarga los mensajes entrantes a la cuenta, ya se probo tambien el envio y si salen, me marca que tengo 31 mensajes en mi correo pero no se cargan y me manda el error de arriba antes de eliminar la cuenta y volverla a crear quiero tratar de solucionar el error por que no se si realmente la eliminacion y crear de nuevo la cuenta soluciona mi problema espero su respuesta

title: 400 error after I changed a password
creator: dan308
content:
Hi. I love Thunderbird! But I cannot use a Gmail account.

It all started when I changed the underlying password for my Gmail account (for routine security). I changed the password too on my Thunderbird client for SMTP and IMAP.

But then it popped up with: https://accounts.google.com/v3/signin/identifier?app_domain=http://localhost& [etc]

it keeps giving me this message:

"400. That’s an error. The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."

I've tried to read online what's going on. I've deleted the account and tried to set up again, and closed Thunderbird. It keeps doing this. I've checked Google settings ... nothing untoward. It doesn't have a link to Thunderbird still.

What can I do?

Thanks, Dan
metadata: ;category:download-and-install;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/124.0.0.0;product:thunderbird;solver_id:5944993

content:
Hi there,

I'm having some difficulty getting my email signature for my new job set up correctly.

I want the company logo to appear on the left, with my details to the right of the logo, as seen in the first screenshot.

However, currently, the text appears incorrectly underneath the company logo. I have tried pasting the signature into a blank email, generating the HTML code and pasting that into the signature text box, yet it still displays incorrectly when sending an email.

The HTML for my email signature is as follows:

<tr> 

 <td style="width:141.5pt;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt" width="189"    valign="top"> 

 </td>  <td style="width:6.0cm;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt" width="227"    valign="top">

James Surname

Write + Rise = Wrise

 

Email: <a href="mailto:james@email.co.uk">james@email.co.uk</a>

Website: wrise.co.uk

 </td>

</tr>

Any guidance you could provide me with would be gratefully received!

Many thanks, James

content:
Hi, Since 4 days all emails messages ending by ".... @akeonet.com" (SFR company) can't be sent or received via THUNDERBIRD. When opening THUNDERBIRD a password is asked for address email "lalevee.claude@akeonet.com". But the current password doesn't work. I'am getting then a demand to "try again" or "enter a new password" or "cancel" but again without any success. However when trying "Configure your existing address email", I'am getting the message: the email address ("lalevee.claude@akeonet.com") is found in the FAI data base MOZILLA ! Using AKEO webmail, I can find new messages received or can send new ones. Please notice, adresses ending by "...@gmail.com" are not concerned by this problem, and still working !??? Stopping firewalls doesn't solve the issue.

Thank's for your help. Claude

title: Thunderbird Portable non visualizza più i nuovi messaggi all'apertura, ma solo i vecchi
creator: vpisano56
content: Buongiorno. Thunderbird, da più di una settimana non mi fa vedere i nuovi messaggi in inbox, ma solo quelli vecchi. Li scarica, mi dà la notifica di ogni nuovo messaggio appena arrivato, la notifica è cliccabile, ma non mi apre il messaggio, questo, ripeto, da più di una settimana. Sono costretto a aprire Thunderbird sempre in "Modalità risoluzione problemi": in questa modalità funziona perfettamente. Di fatto per me non fa nessuna differenza: non ho installato nessuna add-on, o temi, o quant'altro, ma, ogni volta devo attivare la modalità risoluzione problemi, riavviare Thunderbird, e attivare tale modalità. Ho già scritto all'assistenza di Firefox, ma, nessuna risposta. Il mio Thunderbird è la versione "Portable". Temo che la modalità risoluzione problemi argina il problema, probabilmente cè qualcosa che può solo peggiorare, e che la modalità risoluzione problemi" non potrà più tamponare. Se continua così, dovrò cambiare programma di posta elettronica, e sarebbe un peccato, perchè, fin adesso, mi son trovato molto bene, ed ho anche contribuito con le donazione. Grazie in anticipo Vincenzo Pisano
metadata: ;category:other;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 OPR/109.0.0.0;product:thunderbird;solver_id:5943285

title: "lost" emails until today.
creator: homeworld_179
content:
using 115.10.1 for emails... each day there are plenty so i pile them up into one place until the folder reaches a size or a date and then we start over. yesterday, the pc updated and almost immediately the search was gone. i would type abc on the search bar and it would take for ever to scan through the messages. then i would click on the email i wanted but something else would open up in the message pane... https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/may-14-2024-kb5037768-os-builds-19044-4412-and-19045-4412-cb676101-1641-4a6c-b512-8b277606c6e3 https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8

today, i guess, it crashed completely . it started by firing of a warning that not enough space is provided which was not true, then it downloaded 10 messages at once... after a while, the message pane was lost. you click on an email and nothing. it selects it but nothing shows up. blank screen. double click, also opens a new blank tab. fearing a totally corrupt database or even a re-install i pressed repair on the folder. took ages. now, though, i have the profile folder in my PC intact, but TB refuses to load it. i only see the 20 emails i got lately. like starting a new profile all over again...

title: Thunderbird storage
creator: jwingram
content:
I recently un-installed an old version of Thunderbird that was showing a vulnerabilty and would not patch itself to the latest version for some reason (old version was in the 60s). I had all mail stored in a non-standard folder on my D drive so that it would be included with my backups. After uninstalling, my non-standard folder is still there. However, the location where Thunderbird was originally installed was removed and that is not included in my backups.

I installed today the newest version of Thunderbird, but I cannot get it to open my old mail. I'm able to login to my accounts, but I need to access the email stored in my non-standard storage file.
